Uses of Interface
org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.DeviceEventsListener

  • Packages that use DeviceEventsListener 
    Package Description
    org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice
    The package includes classes that allow to start the control panel service ControlPanelService, and manage the list of controllable devices ControllableDevice.

    • Uses of DeviceEventsListener in org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice

      Methods in org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice that return DeviceEventsListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DeviceEventsListener ControllableDevice.getDeviceEventsListener() 
      Methods in org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice with parameters of type DeviceEventsListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ControllableDevice.startSession(DeviceEventsListener eventsListener)
      Starts the session with the remote controllable device
